title: New Linux Flaws Allow Password Hash Theft via Core Dumps in Ubuntu, RHEL, Fedora
description: Two information disclosure flaws have been identified in apport and systemd-coredump, the core dump handlers in Ubuntu, Red Hat Enterprise Linux, and Fedora, according to the Qualys Threat Research Unit (TRU).
